plot: A same sex couple and a little daughter from a previous marriage, fight together for what they deem to be their right to marry and live together, facing law, housing discrimination, and employment discrimination.
title: Fora da Lei
plot_es: A same sex couple and a little daughter from a previous marriage, fight together for what they deem to be their right to marry and live together, facing law, housing discrimination, and employment discrimination.
plot_en: A same sex couple and a little daughter from a previous marriage, fight together for what they deem to be their right to marry and live together, facing law, housing discrimination, and employment discrimination.
